Package it.unibs.ing.arnaldo.rovineperdute

Class Dijkstra

java.lang.Object
it.unibs.ing.arnaldo.rovineperdute.Dijkstra
public class Dijkstra
extends java.lang.Object
Contains methods to perform calculations on Graph using Dijkstra algorithm
Author:
Simone, Alessandro, Francesca

  • Method Details

    • minDistIndex

      private static int minDistIndex​(java.util.ArrayList<City> group)
      Returns the index (id) of the city with the minimum distance value. If more cities have the same distance, the one with highest index is returned.
      Parameters:
      group - the list of cities of which to check the index
      Returns:
      the index found

    • dijkstra

      public static void dijkstra​(Graph nodes, City source, int ind)
      Performs Dijkstra algorithm on a Graph object. It also calculates the route from source city to the city with max index.
      Parameters:
      nodes - the Graph object
      source - the starting node
      ind - ONLY ACCEPTED VALUES ARE 0 OR 1. (Refers to two possible distances between two cities: 0 for planar, 1 for vertical).

    • calculateRoute

      public static void calculateRoute​(int cityId)
      Calculates the route to a given destination and stores it in a static array
      Parameters:
      cityId - the id of destination city

    • display

      public static java.lang.String display​(City destination)
      Returns a string containing the sequence of cities to reach a destination
      Parameters:
      destination -
      Returns:
      string sequence
